title: Vielfalt
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Fast food, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a variety of vegetarian kumpir (baked Turkish-style potatoes with vegetable fillings). The potatoes are mixed with cheese and butter by default, but dishes are made vegan on request. Also offers vegetable-filled toasts; a vegan toast is on the menu and contains couscous, mixed vegs and hot sauce.
